short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that removes all political posts from your linkedin feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing political posts clogging up your LinkedIn feed? Introducing NoPolitiLinked, the solution to your social media woes. With just one click, this extension removes all political posts from your LinkedIn feed, giving you a clean and professional newsfeed. No more scrolling through irrelevant posts, just pure business content that you care about. Download now for a stress-free LinkedIn experience.
